type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.CompatibilityAdapterForTaskOutputs
type.description: * Helper interface for binary compatibility with Gradle 2.x version of the {@link TaskOutputs} interface. * * @deprecated The interface is only here to allow plugins built against Gradle 2.x to run and it will be removed in Gradle 4.0.

method.name: dir
method.description: * Registers an output directory for this task. * * @param path The output directory. The given path is evaluated as per {@link org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)}. * @return this

method.name: file
method.description: * Registers some output file for this task. * * @param path The output file. The given path is evaluated as per {@link org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)}. * @return this

method.name: files
method.description: * Registers some output files for this task. * * @param paths The output files. The given paths are evaluated as per {@link org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)}. * @return this
